overview:
As CEO of AdCast Blue, Tony leads a diverse team of highly specialized professionals who are paving the way for the future of mobile marketing and new media concepts. He is consistently developing and implementing unique ideas and custom strategies for Adcast Blueâ€™s wide range of clients and providing insight into the mobile industry.

Tony is a talented and accomplished Marketing and Business Development leader with proven expertise in marketing and creative strategies, destination event marketing, digital production, campaign management and new business development in the highly competitive marketing and new media environment. His responsibilities include the corporate vision, business development and building strategic alliances and joint ventures with leading like-minded companies worldwide.

He has positioned Adcast Blue to become a global leader on the mobile marketing and new media stage, while continuing to ensure the company builds unique solutions necessary to succeed in a rapidly changing industry.
